<< Contents: QTPW177Q5. SUMMARY : Thinking about each of the following, how would it impact your attitude towards the party that you felt was responsible?

Unnamed: 2: The expansion of the Ultra-Low Emission Zone (ULEZ) in London
Unnamed: 3: The introduction of a default 20 mph speed limit on roads in Wales
Unnamed: 4: Proposals to scrap the northern leg of the HS2 rail line to Manchester, and the HS2 connection to Euston
Unnamed: 5: Ongoing strike action by rail staff
Unnamed: 6: The proposed closure of most railway ticket offices, with staff moving to platforms and concourses
Unnamed: 7: Recent disruption to air traffic control, resulting in large numbers of flight cancellations
Unnamed: 8: Delaying the ban on the sale of new diesel and petrol vehicles from 2030 to 2035
Unnamed: 9: Delaying the ban on new fossil fuel boilers for off-grid homes from 2026 to 2035
Unnamed: 10: Increasing the government grant for installing a heat pump from £5,000 to £7,500
Unnamed: 11: Removing the requirement for all rented properties to be energy efficient (have an EPC 'C' rating) by 2025
